TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrivateComponentAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Identifies a component as a private component that is only seen and activated by components in the same application. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
